name: Reapit Foundations Design System
description:
Foundations is an open-source Design System created by Reapit Design’s team to empower and enhance more stories every day, with simplicity, consistency, accessibility, and performance.

 

We developed a control library as a system of assets on Figma to accelerate the designs of our team and partners. 


You can also find examples of how those controls are used within the Reapit Foundations platform by viewing our UI toolkit ‘Elements’. Our toolkit is built in React JS, exporting a library of CSS classes to help you build clean, interactive user interfaces for the Reapit Foundations ecosystem. It is based on this DesignSystem. 


Please click here to view our Elements storybook.

 


About Reapit

Reapit’s Foundations is a cloud-based Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) and app marketplace that enables real estate agencies, ISVs and developers to extend the power of Reapit’s market-leading Agency Cloud and Property Cloud solutions to lead the way in global PropTech innovation.

 

Learn more about Reapit Foundations by visiting our website.



Release Notes

3.1.0 - April 2022


New Features

  • disable and hover states for desktop buttons
  • disable state for mobile buttons
  • new medium size infographic icon (Manage App Listing)
  • File Upload component


Bug Fixes

  • measurements: misspelling on the red static button; it was 38px, now it’s 40px 
  • measurements: misspelling on the One Choice Chips component - active state, selected chip, padding was decreased from 4px to 3x, margins were increased from 3px to 4px
  • documentation about button types was added to all components that use them
  • static button with icon has been documented
  • static button width size for mobile has been increased to 120px
  • guidelines for static and dynamic buttons have been revised
  • Desktop - Full Options Expansion Panel: button margins and distance between buttons and content have been revised


Removed Features
